A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hugely disappointing. Worst Starwars movie of them all. Boring\, lacks any charm or imagination. I am really struggling to think of a single epic standout moment in the whole film. Even the Phantom Menace had memorable moments such as the Pod Race and Darth Maul. So many problems. Snoke's lame death. Uninteresting new characters with zero development. Kylo Ren is a weak villain. Leia can fly through space i mean come on... really!? The Jedi faith is literally tossed away on a holiday island. I could go on.
